Class Drupal\Tests\abbrfilter\Unit\AbbrfilterTest was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to abbrfilter.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
